EmailTemplate.name: R&O Exchange Unit Availability
EmailTemplate.subject: R&O Exchange Unit Available {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
In spite of our best efforts, the repairs on your unit are taking longer than we expected.
Part number: {!Case.Product_Part_Number__c} Serial number: {!Case.Product_Serial_Number__c} PO #: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}
To help ease you through this down time, Honeywell would like to offer you an exchange unit.
Honeywell exchange units are available on a first-come, first-served basis. To reserve your exchange, please provide us with a written acceptance of this email in the next three calendar days.
If we don’t hear from you in that time, we’ll assume you’re not interested in the exchange unit. And we’ll continue to make repairs to your unit and get it returned as quickly as possible.
Exchange Details
Notification: >>Insert notification #<<
Sales order: >>Insert sales order #<<
Exchange unit information: >>Insert Exchange PN<< / >>Insert Exchange SN<< / >>Insert Exchange TSN if applicable<< / >>Insert Exchange CSN if applicable<<
Questions?
We’ll connect all of your order details through the subject line of this email. So please leave the subject line unchanged, should you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this team.
Thanks again, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
